According to witnesses, a friend of the victim had also been shot dead.

The murder took place on Rua José Carlos Bezerra.

Name: Soraia (Valmir) da Silva
Description:
Soraya had been abducted and tortured without knowing or stating the reason. After being able to go home, she felt bad and was taken to hospital, where she died. It was found that she had had pieces of wood inserted into the rectum and intestines and the penis burnt.

TvT partner organisation  Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans. montanhasrn.wordpress.com   24.02.2012

Name: Deoni Jones
Description:
Deoni was attacked by a man at a bus stop and stabbed in the head. She died in hospital.

In August 2017 Gary N. Montgomery, 55, was acquitted of her murder.

> A D.C. Superior Court trial began on Wednesday for a District man charged with first-degree murder while armed for the February 2012 stabbing death of transgender woman Deoni JaParker Jones, 23, at a bus stop in Northeast Washington.
> 
> Police and prosecutors charged Gary N. Montgomery, who was 55 at the time of the incident, with stabbing Jones in the head as she stood at a bus stop near her home at East Capitol Street and Sycamore Road, N.E. on the evening of Feb. 2, 2012.
> 
> The incident shocked members of the LGBT community who organized vigils at the site of the stabbing and called for greater efforts to curtail hatred and bias toward transgender people.
> 
> Police identified and arrested Montgomery less than a week after the stabbing based on information provided by witnesses and nearby residents.
> 
> The verdict shocked Jones’s family members and LGBT activists, who believed prosecutors and homicide detectives presented a strong case that defendant Gary Montgomery committed the murder. But court observers said the defense raised a number of issues challenging the evidence presented by prosecutors in a trial that began five years after Montgomery was arrested on a charge of first-degree murder while armed.
> 
> The issues brought up by the defense apparently succeeded in raising sufficient doubt in the minds of the jurors that prompted them to hand down a not guilty verdict, according to at least one court observer.

TvT project: Washington Blade 04.02.2012; Metro Weekly 11.04.2012

https://www.washingtonblade.com/2017/08/16/not-guilty-deoni-japarker-jones-murder/

https://www.washingtonpost.com/local/public-safety/district-man-found-not-guilty-in-fatal-stabbing-of-transgender-woman-at-bus-stop/2017/08/16/a1f92436-82ad-11e7-b359-15a3617c767b_story.html?utm_term=.c45ddee0c4af

https://www.washingtonblade.com/2017/08/04/trial-begins-man-charged-murder-trans-woman/

https://www.glaad.org/blog/dc-and-nation-mourns-loss-deoni-jones

http://homicidewatch.org/victims/deoni-jones/

Name: Dulce Mejía García
Description:
Dulce was shot 3 times in the head at the side of a dirt road in the Guillén neighborhood of Chamelecón where she lived.

Her neighbours reported hearing three gunshots at around 1am and found her body at dawn.

Dulce worked in a manufacturing plant in Villanueva, Cortés, was a member of an association of the gay community and a promoter of HIV/AIDS prevention.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans: Periódico El Heraldo Online 14.02.2012

https://web.archive.org/web/20120229195144/http://www.latribuna.hn/2012/02/13/matan-un-travesti-en-calle-de-chamelecon/

Name: Melda Yuksel
Description:
Melda was shot by her brother in the apartment they shared.

> A dispute between two [siblings] turned into a fight in an apartment in Izmit city center. 25-year-old Murat Yuksel shot and killed 26-year-old [Melda] Yüksel.
>
> Murat Yüksel, who owns a shop in Sakarya and sells hunting supplies, and his [sister] [Melda] Yüksel, bought an apartment under construction in Cedit Neighborhood in the city center of Izmit. Today, the two [siblings] went to the house they bought and started to identify the kitchen and furniture needed. A discussion between the two [siblings] turned into a fight with mutual insults. Murat Yüksel couldn't control himself, took out the licensed pistol he carried and shot his sister several times. 5 bullets hit her body and she died at the scene.
>
> Residents who heard gunshots from the building reported the situation to the police. Teams from the scene within a short time, Murat Yüksel was arrested at the scene with the pistol in his hand.

The court gave a reduced sentence of 16 years to the perpetrator claiming that he was subject to "heavy provocation".

TVT project: TGEU SC member Kemal Ordek

https://www.posta.com.tr/travesti-agabeyine-kursun-yagdirdi-108989

https://www.mynet.com/travesti-olan-agabeyini-oldurdu-180100106732

Name: E. J. Vigil Hernández
Description:
E. was shot dead on a football field in the Ciudad Jardín neighborhood at around 7:30pm on 23rd February by MS-13 gang member Herbert Alberto Trejo Vásquez, 27. 

Allegedly she was murdered because she was transgender.

> Herbert Alberto Trejo Vásquez, 27 years old, member of the MS-13, was sentenced to 20 years in prison, for having shot dead the young [woman], [deadname] Vigil Hernández, aged 23, said the prosecutor of the case of the Life Unit of the San Miguel office.
> 
> The aggravated homicide was recorded on February 23, 2012, at approximately 7:30 in the evening, on the football field, located on Las Flores Street and 33 Avenida Sur, in the Ciudad Jardín neighborhood.
> 
> Vigil Hernández was a US citizen because [she] was born in the State of New York, in the United States, and was attacked directly by Trejo Vásquez, who shot [her] four times in the head. The action involved five other terrorists, who gave security to the direct perpetrator of the crime, four of them minors.
> 
> Although the motive for the murder could not be established, one of the lines of investigation was that the deceased was transgender.

Her murder was not recorded on the official TDoR 2012 list released by Transgender Europe (TGEU).

http://cronio.sv/nacionales/pandilleros-asesinaron-ciudadano-estadounidense-supuestamente-transgenero-san-miguel/

http://elblog.com/noticias/registro-50581.html

Name: Evelyn (Daniel Arlex) Ossa Rodríguez
Description:
The perpetrators entered the victim’s apartment and shot her in the head. Evelyn was from France and had come to Medellín shortly before her death.

TvT partner organization: Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans www.tuseguridad.ec 23.02.2012

Name: (Roberto Paulo) de Campos
Description:
The victim was a sex worker. After being stripped naked and stoned on a road in the Estrada do Formigueiro rural area, she was left for six hours until being found, trying to indicate the perpetrator(s) to the police. Shortly after, she died.

TvT project: Media News, online portal, 24.02.2012

Name: Monserrat (Jonathan José) Pineda
Description:
After constant threats by a security guard, Monserrat Pineda reported the aggressor to the police. As the victim passed the security guard’s place of work on Avenida 17, Cabañas she was shot. She died in hospital.

Monserrat was a member of the activist organisation Colectivo Unidad Color Rosa.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans: Periódico La Tribuna, Online 28.02.2012

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
Judicial authorities and members of the Armed Forces confirmed a report of three executed persons, two of whom were trans women.

Note that the exact dates of their deaths are not known, only that they took place in February 2012. Reportedly the bodies were found at km 11 of Carretera a San Mateo.

TvT partner organisation  Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans. ivpressonline.com 29.02.2012
